medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was consulted in 2016 due to bilateral corneal masses that were present at admission to the orphanage. The corneal tumors were diagnosed a few weeks after birth. The condition showed no progression during follow-up visits in 2017 and 2019, with significant regression noted in June 2021.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The mother had epilepsy and regularly took Valproic Acid throughout her pregnancy. The patient was diagnosed with Fetal Valproate Syndrome due to several congenital anomalies, including corneal dermoids.
medical_history.social_history: The patient is an orphan who was abandoned to an orphanage after discharge from the maternity ward.
